tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competitor_marketing_data (
    competitor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name STRING,
    marketing_campaign_id UUID,
    campaign_type STRING,
    campaign_start_date TIMESTAMP,
    campaign_end_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE competitor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    marketing_campaign VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    spent DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (competitor_id) REFERENCES competitor_data(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaign (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignPerformance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id UUID REFERENCES MarketingCampaign(campaign_id),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE competitors (
    competitor_id INT,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(50),
    headquarters_address VARCHAR(255),
    website_url VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    performance_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE competitors (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  industry VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  website VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  competitor_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (competitor_id) REFERENCES competitors(id));

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  ad_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  cost_per_click DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  impression_count INT NOT NULL,
  marketing_campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (marketing_campaign_id) REFERENCES marketing_campaigns(id));

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  ad_id INT NOT NULL,
  clicks INT NOT NULL,
  impressions INT NOT NULL,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(id));
